alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 4:46PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of southeastern Essex, west central Orange, Addison, Rutland, southeastern Chittenden, northwestern Windsor and southwestern Washington Counties through 515 PM EST... At 443 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers near Shoreham, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Rutland, Woodstock, Moriah, Crown Point, Cornwall, Braintree Hill, Sudbury, Weybridge, Killington, Salisbury, Rutland City, Wallingford, Lincoln, Orwell, Rutland - Southern Vermont Airport, Benson, Plymouth, Chittenden and West Rutland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
